@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

function getFanqieCookie() {
    try {
        return String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || '');
    } catch (e) {
        return '';
    }
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? encodeURIComponent(match[0]) : '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
    }
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&cookie=" + fqcookie;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';
var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (device === 'android' && hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie=" + fqcookie;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);
            
            if (!(response && response.data)) {
                  }

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                    	var option = {
                             "method": "POST" ,
                             "body": {"book_ids":value,
                                            "page":"{{page}}"}
                             };
                            groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf3," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("分组获取失败: " + e.message);
                    }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var sessionid = match ? match[0] : '';
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?" + sessionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);
        
        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: fqsjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];
        
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("操作失败: " + e.message);
            }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl =  `${base_url}/discover_style?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.style_list || [];
    java.toast(result.msg);
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
const {
    book_id,
    source: sources,
    tab,
    book_tts,
    tags,
    role,
    last_chapter_title,
    last_chapter_update_time,
    word_number,
    status,
    score,
    media,
    abstract,
    book_review,
    copyright_info
} = result;
java.put('book_detail',JSON.stringify(result));
let info;
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server');
let key = '';

try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
        } catch (e) {key='';}
if (key != ''){key = '✅️已登录';} else {key = '‼️⛔️您还未登录大灰狼账号哦，可以点击右上角登录♨️';}
info = `  🎚当前服务器：${base_url}
🪄大灰狼账号：${key}
🎴当前来源：${sources}
🗂当前模式：${tab}\n`
if (tab =='听书') {info = info+	'🔊当前音色：'+ getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id')+'\n'+book_tts+'\n‎';}
if (`${tags}`) {info = info +  `🕹分类：${tags}\n`};
if (`${role}`) {info = info +  `🎗书籍主角：${role}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_title}`) {info = info +  `🎯最新章节：${last_chapter_title}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_update_time}`) {info = info +  `⏳更新时间：${last_chapter_update_time}\n`};
if (`${word_number}`) {info = info +  `📝书籍字数：${word_number}\n`};
if (`${status}`) {info = info +  `💥书籍状态：${status}\n`};
if (`${score}`) {info = info +  `✨书籍评分：${score}\n`};
if (`${media}`) {info = info +  `📌出版媒体：${media}\n`};
if (`${abstract}`) {info = info +  `‎
📚书籍简介：
${abstract}\n`};
if (`${book_review}`) {info = info +  `‎\n${book_review}\n`};
if (`${copyright_info}`) {info = info +  `📍${copyright_info}`};
</js>

<js>

let res =java.hexDecodeToString(result).split('大灰狼融合2.1');

let item_id = res[0];
let tab = res[1];
let title = res[2];
let sources = res[3];
let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id');
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server');
let key2 = '';
try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';} 
let device,device_type;
try {
    device = java.androidId();
    device_type='安卓';
} catch (e) {
    try{
device = java.deviceID();
device_type='苹果';
}catch (e) {device = '';
device_type='安卓';
}
}
let sq_user_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'sq_user_id') || '0';

let content_url;
if (tab=='小说') {
	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&sq_user_id=${sq_user_id}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {
 	 	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&tone_id=${tone_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 	} else if (tab=='漫画') {
 		 	content_url=	`/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 		} else if (tab=='短剧' || tab=='视频') {
 		content_url=	`/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 			}
 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);
 try {
if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
	java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);
	}}catch (e) {}
data = JSON.parse(data);
let content = decrypt(data.content);
data = JSON.stringify({'content':content});
//java.log(decrypt(data.content));
if (device_type=='安卓' && (tab  == '短剧' || tab== '视频')){
	data = {'content':`【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`}
	data = JSON.stringify(data);
	 if (book.durChapterIndex===chapter.index){
	 //let b64 = java.base64Encode(generateVideoPage(title,content));
	// let dataUrl = `data:text/html;base64,${b64}`;
	// 	java.startBrowser(dataUrl,title);
	 	java.startBrowser(content,title);
	 	java.toast('正在加载视频...');
	}};

data;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server');
let key2 = '';
try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';}


let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source');
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media');
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>

"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "")

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

function getFanqieCookie() {
    try {
        return String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || '');
    } catch (e) {
        return '';
    }
}

function getSessionId(cookieString) {
    const match = cookieString.match(/sessionid=([^;]+)/);
    return match ? match[1] : null;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("分组获取失败: " + e.message);
        }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: fqsjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];

        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("操作失败: " + e.message);
    }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl = `${base_url}/discovestyle?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.data || [];
    if (result.msg) {
        java.toast(result.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
const {
    book_id,
    source: sources,
    tab,
    book_tts,
    tags,
    role,
    last_chapter_title,
    last_chapter_update_time,
    word_number,
    status,
    score,
    abstract,
    copyright_info
} = result;

java.put('book_detail', JSON.stringify(result));
function getKey(key) {
    const parts = key.split(";");
    for (let part of parts) {
        if (part.includes("qttoken")) {
            return part.split("=")[1];
        }
    }
    return "";
}
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'server');
let key = '';
try {
    const cookieValue = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
    key = getKey(cookieValue);
    } catch (e) {
    key = '';
}

const loginStatus = key ? '✅ 已登录' : '⚠️ 未登录 | 点击右上角 🔖 登录';

const lightDivider = '❇️───────❇️───────❇️';
const heavyDivider = '‎\n‎';

const isValid = (value) => String(value).length > 1;

let info = `
    📡 当前服务：${base_url}
    🔑 账号状态：${loginStatus}
    🏷 数据来源：${sources}
    🔄 当前模式：${tab}
`;

if (tab == '听书') {
    const toneId = getArguments(source.getVariable(), 'tone_id');
    if (isValid(book_tts)) {
        info += `${lightDivider}
    🎵 音色配置：${toneId}
    ${book_tts}
`;
}}

let basicInfo = '';
const addBasicInfo = (value, prefix, icon) => {
    if (isValid(value)) basicInfo += `    ${icon} ${prefix} ${value}\n`;
};

addBasicInfo(tags, '书籍分类：', '🌈');
addBasicInfo(role, '书籍主角：', '👑');
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, '最新章节：', '📚');
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, '更新时间：', '⏳');
addBasicInfo(word_number, '书籍字数：', '📊');
addBasicInfo(status, '书籍状态：', '🚩');
addBasicInfo(score, '书籍评分：', '⭐');

if (basicInfo) info += `${lightDivider}\n${basicInfo}`;

if (isValid(abstract)) {
    const indentedAbstract = abstract.split('\n').map(line => `    ${line}`).join('\n');
    info += `${heavyDivider}
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
} else {
    info += `${heavyDivider}`;
}

if (isValid(copyright_info)) {
    info += `${lightDivider}
    © ${copyright_info}
`;
} else {
    info += `${lightDivider}`;
}

info += `
${heavyDivider}
    💠💠💠 数据更新于 ${new Date().toLocaleString()} 💠💠💠
`;

info = info.split('\n').map(line => line.replace(/^ {4}/, '')).join('\n');
</js>

let device, device_type;

    device = java.androidId();
    device_type = '安卓';
} catch (e) {
    try {
        device = java.deviceID();
        device_type = '苹果';
    } catch (e) {
        device = '';
        device_type = '安卓';
    }
}
if (sources == '番茄' && tab == '小说') {
	try {
		let op = {"method":"POST",
"body":`item_id=${item_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&tone_id=${tone_id}&version=4.6.29&is_app=true`,
"headers":{"cookie":cookie.getCookie(base_url)}
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);
let content_url = `/content,${op}`;
data = java.ajax(base_url + content_url);
content = JSON.parse(data).content;
//	java.log(content);
    eval(content);
   // java.log(content);
    content = cleanHTML(content);
    java.log('app');
 } catch (e) {
 	content = '';
    }
		} 
	if (!content) {
let op = {"method":"POST",
"body":`item_id=${item_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&tone_id=${tone_id}&version=4.6.29`,
"headers":{"cookie":cookie.getCookie(base_url)}
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);
let content_url = `/content,${op}`;

let data = java.ajax(base_url + content_url);
try {
    if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
        java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);
    }
} catch (e) {}
data = JSON.parse(data);
content = data.content;
content = decrypt(content);
};
if (sources == '番茄' && cache.get("fqpara") == "on" && tab == "小说") {
    content = getComments(content, book_id, item_id);
}
data = JSON.stringify({
    'content': content
});
//java.log(decrypt(data.content));
if (device_type == '安卓' && (tab == '短剧' || tab == '视频')) {
    data = {
        'content': `【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
    if (book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {

        java.startBrowser(video_url, title);
        java.toast('正在加载视频...');
    }
};
data;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server');
let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source');
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media');
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&page={{page}}`
</js>

   java.webView(null, u, "document.cookie")
   ck = cookie.getCookie(u)

   url = u + "," + head
   result = java.ajax(url)
}

  }
})()

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

var item_id = java.hexDecodeToString(result); var book_id = java.get('book_id'); var type = String(java.get('type')); var v = JSON.parse(source.getVariable()); var sz = v.sz; var tone = v.tone; if (type == 1) { book.type = 64; } else if (type == 4 || sz != 0) { book.type = 32; } else if (sz == 0) { book.type = 8; } if (type == 4 || sz != 0) { if (type == 4) { url = source.bookSourceUrl + `/audio?tone_id=1&item_ids=${item_id}`; } else if (sz != 0) { url = source.bookSourceUrl + `/audio?${tone}&item_ids=${item_id}`; } try { result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]['main_url']; } catch(e) { result = "未知错误"; } } else { let url = source.bookSourceUrl + '/content2?item_id=' + item_id; let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.content; function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); } result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "") @@p@html||html

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "未分组": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["未分组"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>

<js>
let book_ids = [];
let book_list = [];
let res = JSON.parse(result);
let i = String(java.get("i"));
let key = String(java.get("key"));
let page = Number(java.get("page"));
try {
  list = res["search_tabs"][i]["data"];
  if(list == null) list = res["search_tabs"][1]["data"];
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(list))

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
url=baseUrl.replace(/book/,'chapter');
m=java.ajax(url);
re=String(m).match(/[\s\S]*data-p.*?(\d+)[\s\S]*?\/ul>/)[1]
java.put("m",re)
if(baseUrl.match(/fanqxsw/)){
	java.getString('text.章节目录@href')
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/kanshudashi/)){		a=baseUrl.match(/book\/(.*?)\./)[1];
b=`https://www.kanshudashi.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"method":"post","body": "id=${a}&page=1"}`;
}else if (baseUrl.match(/kelexs/)){
		a=baseUrl.match(/book\/(.*?)\./)[1];
b=`https://www.kelexs.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"method":"post","body": "id=${a}&page=1"}`;
}
</js>

ruleSearch.author: a.2@text
ruleSearch.name: a.1@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/kele/)){
	result=java.getElements("$.data[*]")
	}else{
if(String(result).match(/\<a\>/)){
	result=java.getElements("class.list font18 chapListBody@ul@li@a")
	}else{
		result=java.getElements("$.data[*]")
		}
}
		//java.log(result)
		result
</js>
ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
m=java.get("m");
if(baseUrl.match(/fanqx/)){
var a = baseUrl.match(/\/chapter\/(.*?)\.html/);
//java.log(a[1]);
let hrefList = [];
if (a) {
  var b = result.match(/data\-p\="\d+"/g).length;
  if (b) {
    for(let i = 1; i <= b; i++) {
      let href = `https://www.fanqxsw.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"body":"id=${a[1]}&page=${i}","method":"POST"}`;
     //java.log(href);
      hrefList.push(href);
    }
    hrefList
     }
}
}else {
list=[]
if(JSON.parse(result).data.length>0){
	for (i = 2; i <= m; i++){
	list.push(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/,'page=' +i))
		}
		list
	}
	}

</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = source.bookSourceUrl +  `/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.list;
length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	name = "🏮〖"+data[i].name+"〗🏮";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
		book_id = java.get('book_id');
		//book_id = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+).html/)[1];
    href = `/cdn/book/content/${book_id}/${id}.html`;   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
   };
	chapterList
	}
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
cookie.removeCookie(source.key);
url=source.key;
a=java.ajax(url);
//java.log(a)
b=a.match(/action=\"([^"]*)\"/)[1];
c=`?searchkey=${key},{"method": "get"}`;
b+=c
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

function getFanqieCookie() {
    try {
        return String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || '');
    } catch (e) {
        return '';
    }
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source', String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? encodeURIComponent(match[0]) : '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
    }
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&cookie=" + fqcookie;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';
var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (device === 'android' && hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie=" + fqcookie;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);
            
            if (!(response && response.data)) {
                  }

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                    	var option = {
                             "method": "POST" ,
                             "body": {"book_ids":value,
                                            "page":"{{page}}"}
                             };
                            groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf3," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("分组获取失败: " + e.message);
                    }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var sessionid = match ? match[0] : '';
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?" + sessionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);
        
        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: fqsjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];
        
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("操作失败: " + e.message);
            }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl =  `${base_url}/discover_style?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.style_list || [];
    java.toast(result.msg);
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
const {
    book_id,
    source: sources,
    tab,
    book_tts,
    tags,
    role,
    last_chapter_title,
    last_chapter_update_time,
    word_number,
    status,
    score,
    media,
    abstract,
    book_review,
    copyright_info
} = result;
java.put('book_detail',JSON.stringify(result));
let info;
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key = '';

try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
        } catch (e) {key='';}
if (key != ''){key = '✅️已登录';} else {key = '‼️⛔️您还未登录大灰狼账号哦，可以点击右上角登录♨️';}
info = `  🎚当前服务器：${base_url}
🪄大灰狼账号：${key}
🎴当前来源：${sources}
🗂当前模式：${tab}\n`
if (tab =='听书') {info = info+	'🔊当前音色：'+ getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment))+'\n'+book_tts+'\n‎';}
if (`${tags}`) {info = info +  `🕹分类：${tags}\n`};
if (`${role}`) {info = info +  `🎗书籍主角：${role}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_title}`) {info = info +  `🎯最新章节：${last_chapter_title}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_update_time}`) {info = info +  `⏳更新时间：${last_chapter_update_time}\n`};
if (`${word_number}`) {info = info +  `📝书籍字数：${word_number}\n`};
if (`${status}`) {info = info +  `💥书籍状态：${status}\n`};
if (`${score}`) {info = info +  `✨书籍评分：${score}\n`};
if (`${media}`) {info = info +  `📌出版媒体：${media}\n`};
if (`${abstract}`) {info = info +  `‎
📚书籍简介：
${abstract}\n`};
if (`${book_review}`) {info = info +  `‎\n${book_review}\n`};
if (`${copyright_info}`) {info = info +  `📍${copyright_info}`};
</js>

device = java.deviceID();
device_type='苹果';
}catch (e) {device = '';
device_type='安卓';
}
}

let content_url;
if (tab=='小说') {
	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&sq_user_id=${sq_user_id}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {

 		content_url=	`/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key2}&version=3`;
 			}
 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);
 try {
if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
	java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);

	data = JSON.stringify(data);
	 if (book.durChapterIndex===chapter.index){

	}};

data;

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key2 = '';
try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';}


let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source',String(source.bookSourceComment));
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media',String(source.bookSourceComment));
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

/*同站一大堆
修复搜索，可设置源变量限制搜索数量
优化by:游客2580
搜索加载by:Thomas&&youke2580
同类型网站可以自行替换网址*/
header: { "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 9) Mobile Safari/537.36"}

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*
ruleSearch.name: $.articlename

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

	function parse(data,y){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	  try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
	  try {tag = args[3];
u=tag=="w"?'https://cxb-pro.cread.com/cx/new/catelistnew?uid=127995117&cnid=10013&version=8.1.4&flid='+parseInt(url/10)*10+'&thirdCateId='+url+'&sortType=1&bookStatus='+y+'&wordnumType=0&pageSize=20&curpage={{page}}':y;
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}
	
	
function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["🔖男频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["🔖女频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载🔖::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结🔖::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')

.replace(/\[|。/,'')

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);

# 遇到阅读云
![Screenshot_2024-12-13-01-53-36-69_df198e732186825c8df26e3c5a10d7cd.jpg](http://img.wuaze.com/2024/12/13/675b24e82d244.jpg)
方法一@柚屿. 
搜索js
site=实际网站情况
比如m54kanshu
m43kanshu
```js
https://www.sososhu.com/?site=youpin&q={{key}},{
  headers: { "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; PACM00 Build/QP1A.190711.020) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.5359.79 Mobile Safari/537.36" }}
```
列表规则js
```js
<js>
if (result.match(/阅读云/)) {
   u = baseUrl.split(',')[0]
   cookie.removeCookie(u)
   // java.startBrowserAwait(u, "验证")
   java.webView(null, u, "document.cookie")
   ck = cookie.getCookie(u)
   head = JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'Cookie': ck } })
   url = u + "," + head
   result = java.ajax(url)
}
result
</js>
.block > div > div:nth-child(n+1)
```
方法二@ljy911028
登录认证js
```js
var src = result.body();
if(key && /ge_ua/.test(src)){
	url = java.ruleUrl;
	result = java.startBrowserAwait(url, "验证");
	}
result
```
请求头js
```js
@js:  
JSON.stringify({"Referer": baseUrl,  
"X-Requested-With": "mark.via",  
"Accept-Language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7",  
"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; PACM00 Build/QP1A.190711.020) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.5359.79 Mobile Safari/537.36"})
```

<js>
b=baseUrl.match(/gid=(\d+)&nid=(\d+)&sort=(\d+)&chapter_name=(.*$)/);
t = String(Math.round(new Date()));
gid=b[1];
nid=b[2];
s = b[3];
c = b[4];
snk=java.md5Encode("a=1&ac=999&appType=0&appid=10001&appverion=508500&autoBuy=0&bidType=0&birt=1706674841000&ch=blf1298_10928_001&chType=6&chapter_name="+c+"&cid=eef_easou_book&dzh=1&gender=1&gid="+gid+"&gsort=0&instId="+t+"&instime="+t+"&nid="+nid+"&os=android&pr=-1.0&ptype=5&pushid=7b4aaf1210a5bdbac3cea26d5030a419&recSw=1&rtype=2&scp=0&sequence=1&session_id=153F4EEE16F56A43FD63ZD21B866413ED9BE044EFB876A115C62DBED82EE4C824D&sgsort=0&sort="+s+"&tm=0&udid=3d3ec742930b635fc4c61f0575dbc4d2939edbe2&userInitPay=3&utype=0&vm=5.8.5&key=EaSoU0517+PuBlIsHkEy-JRKKOWTUNZCNTWY-");
snk = snk.toUpperCase();

url=`https://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&vm=5.8.5&os=android&udid=3d3ec742930b635fc4c61f0575dbc4d2939edbe2&appverion=508500&ch=blf1298_10928_001&session_id=153F4EEE16F56A43FD63ZD21B866413ED9BE044EFB876A115C62DBED82EE4C824D&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=2&pushid=7b4aaf1210a5bdbac3cea26d5030a419&ptype=5&gender=1&userInitPay=3&birt=1706674841000&instime=${t}&instId=${t}&chType=6&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&pr=-1.0&tm=0&ac=999&gid=${gid}&nid=${nid}&sort=${s}&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=1&chapter_name=${c}&snk=${snk}`;
java.ajax(url)
</js>$.content<js>
function a(str) {
	str = String(str);
	length = str.length / 2;
	bArr = [];
	for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {
		i2 = i * 2;
		bArr[i] =  intToByte(parseInt(str.substring(i2, i2 + 2), 16));
  }
  return bArr;
}
function intToByte(i) {
	var b = i & 0xFF;var c = 0;
	if (b >= 128) {c = b % 128;c = -1 * (128 - c);}
	else {c = b;}
	return c;
}

 function byteToHexString(arr) {
    return arr.reduce((accu, item) => {
        let a =(item&0xff).toString(16)
        if (a.length ==1) a = "0" + a
        return accu += a
    }, "")
  }
  function hextoBase64(t) {
	function parse(t) {
		t = String(t)
		for (var e = t.length, r = [], i = 0; i < e; i += 2){
		r[i >>> 3] |= parseInt(t.substr(i, 2), 16) << 24 - i % 8 * 4;
		}
		return r;
	}
	function stringify(t) {
		var e = t
		, r = 4 * t.length
		, i = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";
		for (var n = [], o = 0; o < r; o += 3){
		    for (var s = (e[o >>> 2] >>> 24 - o % 4 * 8 & 255) << 16 | (e[o + 1 >>> 2] >>> 24 - (o + 1) % 4 * 8 & 255) << 8 | e[o + 2 >>> 2] >>> 24 - (o + 2) % 4 * 8 & 255, a = 0; a < 4 && o + .75 * a < r; a++){
			n.push(i.charAt(s >>> 6 * (3 - a) & 63));}
		}
		var c = i.charAt(64);
		if (c){
		   for (; n.length % 4; ){
			      n.push(c);}
		}
		return n.join("")
	}
	return stringify(parse(t));
}

sf = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
d=hextoBase64(byteToHexString(a(result)));
key = iv = "EaSoUcNt";
result=java.aesBase64DecodeToString(d,key,sf,iv);
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

variableComment:
✱✱输入数字 变更发现列表：
1  男榜+女榜  (默认列表)
2  女榜+男榜
3  仅男榜
4  仅女榜
5  旧的发现列表x
✱✱若发现列表没变更，长按列表顶栏，弹出菜单选“刷新”，收起列表再摊开。
